description: This file defines a Java interface for a REST client using Spring Cloud OpenFeign. It provides a method to retrieve user information from a core banking service by user identification.

classes.name: BankingCoreRestClient
classes.description: A Feign client interface for communicating with the core banking service to fetch user data.

methods.name: readUser
methods.description: Fetches user details from the core banking service based on the provided identification.
